ARABIC: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ بَدَّلُوا۟ نِعْمَتَ ٱللَّهِ كُفْرًا وَأَحَلُّوا۟ قَوْمَهُمْ دَارَ ٱلْبَوَارِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Do you not see those who have exchanged Allah's blessing for kufr, and moved their people to the abode of ruin:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Have you not looked at those who repaid God's favours with ingratitude; who pulled their people down to ruin,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Did you not see those who have exchanged Allah's favour with ingratitude to Him, causing their people to be cast in the abode of utter perdition
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Have you not seen those who changed the Word of God through disbelief and led their people to destruction?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Did you not see those who exchanged the grace of Allah for ungratefulness and led their people down to the home of destruction?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Have you not seen those who have changed the blessings of Allah into disbelief (by denying Prophet Muhammad and his Message of Islam), and caused their people to dwell in the house of destruction
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Have you not seen those who have changed Allah's favor for ungratefulness and made their people to alight into the abode of perdition
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Hast thou not seen those who exchanged the bounty of God with unthankfulness, and caused their people to dwell in the abode of ruin? --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Hast thou not seen those who gave the grace of Allah in exchange for thanklessness and led their people down to the Abode of Loss,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do you not see those who, in exchange for God's favour, offer only ingratitude and cause their people to descend into the Abode of Ruin?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Beholdest thou not those who returned the favour of Allah with infidelity and caused their people to alight in the dwelling of perdition:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Have you not regarded those who have changed Allah’s blessing with ingratitude, and landed their people in the house of ruin?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Hast thou not turned thy vision to those who have changed the favour of Allah. Into blasphemy and caused their people to descend to the House of Perdition?-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Have you not seen those who have changed the Blessings of Allah into disbelief (by denying Prophet Muhammad SAW and his Message of Islam), and caused their people to dwell in the house of destruction?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Have you not seen those who exchanged the favor of Allah with disbelief and landed their nation in a house of ruin?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Have you not seen those who exchanged the blessing of God with blasphemy, and landed their people into the house of perdition?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Have you not considered those who exchanged the favor of Allah for disbelief and settled their people [in] the home of ruin?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [14:28] Have you not seen, observed, those who exchanged God’s grace, that is, the thanks [due] for it, for unthankfulness — these were the disbelievers of Quraysh — and who, by leading them astray, caused their people to take up residence in the Abode of Ruin?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 268 (Hast thou not seen) have you not been informed, Muhammad, about (those who gave the grace of Allah in exchange) they changed the gift of Allah who bestowed upon them the Scripture and the messengers and instead opted (for thanklessness) disbelief in Muhammad (pbuh) and in the Qur'an. These are the Banu Umayyah and the Banu'l-Mughirah who fed the army of the unbelievers on the Day of Badr, (and led their people down to) they let the people of Mecca camp at (the Abode of Loss) the abode of destruction, i.e. the place of Badr; it is also said that the Abode of Loss refers to Gehenna,
